## UserInputQuestion.prompt property

prompt text providing some ask or explanation to the user prompt can have dynamic value defined by a function with type `LocalFunc<string | undefined>`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
prompt?: string | LocalFunc<string | undefined>;
```
